more.about:
" another form of simplicity "
A clothing store which based in Vietnam with a whole idea of simple and casual clothing. The items we create can be easily mix-and-match together and most importantly they are everyday wearable. Started out as an online clothing shop and now growing further to not only online selling, we understand any expectations customers may have for us and our aim is to bring happiness and joy to all of our customers.
Please drop us an email at info@nosbyn.com for any questions regarding our products or any comments or feedbacks.
We can also be reached at : 01267606078 (excluding holidays and weekend )
